column4: Just installed Audacity and it can't find my sound card. Can anyone point me in the right direction?
hmm, let me get audacity (I am actually running suse right now but eh I'll try)
yeah some source is messed up, still getting audacity
is something else using your sound card? like a music player?
mplayer had been opened but was not playing. Now it is off completely but still no soap
everything's off - everything, and still - there was an error initializing the audio i/o layer. You will not be able to play or record audio
yes something else is, that's the same error I got
I closed amarok and it worked
what am I grepping for though
try killall gdm, (this will kill your gui, and this irc session) and then start it again with sudo gdm, then try audacity
